title: 美國眾議院提出一項兩黨決議 譴責中國政府打壓香港人權及自由 並要求拜登政府就香港問題採取進一步行動

replies.msg:
此項決議的主要提案人包括眾議院外交委員會主席、民主黨人 Greg Meeks 和副主席共和黨人 Michael McCaul。

...

The oppressive, intentionally vague law has been weaponized to target pro-democracy activists and legislators and undermined the city’s independent judicial system.

...

“Since enacting its national security law and ending Hong Kong’s autonomy, the Chinese Communist Party has confirmed the world’s worst fears: mass arrests, the ejection of pro-democracy legislators, arbitrary internet blockages, and the criminalization of fundamental human rights have, sadly, become the new normal,” said Rep. McCaul. “With this Resolution, the Committee is making a strong bipartisan statement that we are committed to bring accountability for the CCP’s violations of international commitments to Hong Kong’s autonomy and democracy.”

...

urges the Biden Administration to take further actions to stand in solidarity with the people of Hong Kong.

..

Source:
https://www.thestandnews.com/politics/美國眾議院提出兩黨決議-譴責中國及港府侵害香港權利自由/?fbclid=IwAR0DS-qKerjnlSoEGDDGXCsZYUu1DzLNsQMHbg4mvD50NrkNXNnQ1E9nnxk

https://foreignaffairs.house.gov/press-releases?ID=19108390-ADC6-4D47-8570-898A5228AACB
